Hendersonville.Cleveland Hall (Nashville, Tennessee):
Cleveland Hall is an Antebellum mansion in Nashville, Tennessee.


== Location ==
It is located at 4041 Old Hickory Boulevard in Nashville, Davidson County, Tennessee, United States.


== History ==
It was designed by master builders Joseph Reiff and William C. Hume, who built The Hermitage in 1835, constructed under the supervision of owner, Stockly Donelson, and completed in 1839.
